id.description: The unique identifier of the order

created_at.description: The date and time when the order was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the order was last updated

test.description: Indicates if the order is a test order

total_line_items_price.description: The total price of all line items in the order

total_discounts.description: The total amount of discounts applied to the order

total_shipping_price_set.description: The details of the total shipping price for the order.

amount.description: The total shipping amount in shop currency

currency_code.description: The currency code for the total shipping price in shop currency

amount.description: The total shipping amount in presentment currency

currency_code.description: The currency code for the total shipping price

total_tax.description: The total tax amount for the order

financial_status.description: The financial status of the order

fulfillment_status.description: The fulfillment status of the order

cancelled_at.description: The date and time when the order was canceled

cancel_reason.description: The reason provided if the order was canceled
